name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Clickatell
description: This is a repository of clickatell APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Clickatell
apis.description: Clickatell is a leading company in Global Mobile Messaging. You can reach 1000+ global networks with 1 API using Clickatells Bulk SMS Gateway.
